results.content: This course was what I was looking for to expand my skills. I suggest having code snippets available along the way for the parts where you are copying and pasting. Otherwise, there's no trial period since you have to request for the code repository access to do major copying and pasting. I suppose I could have stopped the video and typed it all, but that is time-consuming. Thanks!

results.content:
Finally, a course that teaches you to write real software and not just a typical todo or hello world app. 

PROS:
The author takes you through writing a complete app from scratch. 
Learnt a lot about storing and retrieving data in Firebase Firestore as well.
The instructor writes the software completely and speaks about the concepts involved. Definitely worth the money, if you are ready to put your time and effort into writing a real software.

CONS:
Needs a lot of effort and patience, the author speaks about various possibilities of error occurences every time and keeps focusing on eliminating bugs as much as possible. (Not sure if this is a con).

Overall:
If you are familiar with the basics of Angular or web development in general, simply go for it. Else, would recommend spending some time on learning the basics of Angular before buying this. Overall, it's an awesome course worth for the price I paid.
